title: 214: MATT JAMES’ CAST BIO BREAKDOWN (Another Date Night Edition)
itunes:title: 214: MATT JAMES’ CAST BIO BREAKDOWN (Another Date Night Edition)
description:
TBH this cast looks pretty amazing!! The time has come for cast bio breakdowns (aka assumptions) of Matt James’ contestants AND Grayston and Evan are here to join Bekah and Jess again! They throw back a few drinks, get a little unhinged, and make guesses about the whole cast based mostly off of photos per tradition. The Broads cannot wait to see who they were very wrong about and who they were very right about - but in the meantime, they all had a grand old time taking guesses!

***JOIN THE BROADS JANUARY 5TH FOR MATT JAMES’ PREMIERE EPISODE RECAP! 

FOLLOW ALONG WITH THE CAST BIO PICS HERE: https://abc.com/shows/the-bachelor/cast


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HelloFresh.com/10chatty and use code 10chatty for 10 free meals, including free shipping!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off your fertility test when you go to Modernfertility.com/chatty.

***CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com/chatty50 and enter code chatty50

***ROTHY’S: Check out all the amazing shoes, bags and masks available right now at Rothys.com/CHATTY


GRAYSTON LEONARD: 

Follow him: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Check out Bekah and Gray’s Patreon here: https://www.patreon.com/bekahandgray


EVAN AMBROSE:

Follow him: @https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

Watch his Real Housewives Recap podcast “House Cats” here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFVsc1l_30f7-NTzqlE2tzg?feature=emb_ch_name_ex

Follow House Cats podcast here: https://www.instagram.com/housecatspodcast/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
